website_summaries.verdict: While it's an inexpensive model with a space-saving footprint, it has some faults that may hamper overall performance.
pros: Compact design with a two-tier cooking system
cons: Leaks that originate in the bottom of the unit have been reported
Some complaints about a flimsy knob and loose-fitting lid

customer_reviews.title: Yummy!
customer_reviews.text: I just got the steamer yesterday and couldn't wait to try it. I put a bunch of frozen broccoli and frozen shrimp with some bay leaves paprika and pepper in the water. The food was infused with the smell of bay leaves. It took about 25 minutes for the food to be cooked.
customer_reviews.author: Adel mam

customer_reviews.title: Works well but beware, basket order matters
customer_reviews.text: Small and lightweight. Replaced an older Oster which we liked but was warn from lots of use. Note: the basket handles have a # 1 or 2 molded into them. Basket #1 is 'always' the bottom basket or puddling of condensed steam onto your counter will result. We don't use two tiers as a general rule but did notice using #2 by itself resulted in puddling but #1 by itself did not because it seals to the base correctly. A look at the exploded view diagram in the manual shows #2 sitting atop #1. It makes a difference!
customer_reviews.author: Charles G.

customer_reviews.title: Stuff on the bottom
customer_reviews.text: I made sure to clean every dish part with warm soapy water and the reservoir with damp, clean cloth before I used it. The heating part in the middle of the reservoir is covered with chalky stuff after the first usage, and I was only cooking sweet potatoes :( What is this stuff? Can anyone let me know? Plus, I used brita-filtered water for the reservoir.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Park

customer_reviews.title: Cooks well,  major design flaw
customer_reviews.text: Great steamer. Cooks food easy and fast. Downside is the reservoir is much too shallow. When food is finished it's almost to the brim if not overflowing. Makes disposing of the water difficult
customer_reviews.author: ricklb

customer_reviews.title: Great if you can stand repeatative sounds
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice on the counter and steams quickly. I only gave it 3 stars for the dial. Not only are the numbers on the dial hard to see, like some of the other reviews have mentioned, it also makes an annoying clicking noise the entire time it's in use. It's like an old egg timer.
customer_reviews.author: H.K

customer_reviews.title: The price is right and the quality is good.
customer_reviews.text: This product is very good. I works well for steaming any kind of food. We use it for steaming Chinese dim sum, squash, fish and many other things. It would get five stars if the slide out for adding more water could be bigger. The price is right and the quality is good. It's relatively easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Cedar

customer_reviews.title: Love everything except the timer
customer_reviews.text: I chose this steamer to replace a digital one where the bottoms of the the baskets were not attached, and kept falling out. That, plus the fact that the parts were not dishwasher safe, made me want to replace it. This one works well, and I use it almost daily. The only problem is that I wish it had a digital timer because I don't think this is as accurate. Not a big deal for some foods, but for some it is, so in those cases I use a kitchen timer. Heats up quickly, no leaks, cooks evenly, and dishwasher safe.
customer_reviews.author: Goddard Heriot

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: I used this product three times. The first two times I noticed excess water on my counter after the unit shut off. So the third time I put a cookie sheet under it to see what was happening. Low and behold, after shut off, all of the water that was in the reservoir leaked out onto the cookie sheet. But that was after I had manually turned the timer off because it stopped working on third use...you know...the use where I decided to steam rice and 45 minutes later that rice still wasn't done, even when using their recommended rice to water ratio. Seems like I am not the only one that had these issues.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for corn on the cob. My daughter would have to lug hers over for us to use on our Sunday get togethers. I looked for a reasonable priced one with features I liked. This one does GREAT! Eady to clean, 2 tiers that when finished to put away, the tiers fit into each other for space saving room. Can not tell the difference in looks, features of my daughters much higher priced one. Great price, fits away perfectly. Pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Adams

customer_reviews.title: Timer control is kinda weird
customer_reviews.text: After 5 years, the steamer I bought from Target had to be retired to the garbage can. This Bella is more versatile as it is slightly wider which is just perfect for me having to steam chinese broccoli, in which the stalks tends to be longer and the stem is eaten compared to regular broccoli where the stems are mostly discarded. I did not give it 5 stars because the timer control is set where the rotation starts at around 7:00 o'clock instead of 12:00 o'clock. It took sometime to get used to it. Except for that, great steamer.
customer_reviews.author: gfrontosa

customer_reviews.title: Operable
customer_reviews.text: Product leaks profusely 👎🏾 Something is wrong with product it leaks You sent me another one the second one is still leaking - manufacture did a horrible job in manufacturing this product - it leaks profusely 👎🏾
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Super Cheap Quality and Flimsy Materials
customer_reviews.text: I don't expect to get much use out of this steamer. I have never seen such cheap construction and materials. I fully expect the baskets to break or crack after first use, that is how cheap the materials are. Assembled, it is wobbly and unsteady on the counter. If I can get a few meals out if it, great. If not, it was only $14 so no great loss. Remember....you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew R

customer_reviews.title: Will not automatically turn off when there is no water in there
customer_reviews.text: I accidentally did not pour enough water, and it dry out after 10mins and did not automatically turn off. Based on the description, this should not be happened. I purchased this item for avoiding safety issue, but it did not work properly. I was disappointed :( After several times use, the burner became so disgusting and I don’t think it is healthy for the food. No recommended
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great for Awhile
customer_reviews.text: This is why I wait a bit to write product reviews. The steamer worked great for the first four months. We purchased this on February 12 this year and now it’s leaking from the bottom. It has not mishandled or placed in a dishwasher or any such thing. It just started leaking all of a sudden. The leak seems to be coming from the center mechanism. I’ll be looking for another brand to order.
customer_reviews.author: Lindazkewl

customer_reviews.title: Stains counter tops?
customer_reviews.text: My order arrived yesterday. I read the following in the instruction manual, apparently referring to the "feet" on the bottom unit: "Plasticizer warning - CAUTION: to prevent Plasticizers from migrating to the finish of the counter top or table top or other furniture, place NON-PLASTIC coasters or place mats between the appliance and the finish of the counter top or table top Failure to do so may cause the finish to darken; permanent blemishes may occur or stains can appear." I do not want a counter top appliance that I cannot use on counter top, so I am returning this unit and ordering a different model, which hopefully will have more functional "feet."
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Cargill

customer_reviews.title: Great for 1!
customer_reviews.text: The first product I received did not have a drip tray. However, Amazon replaced it and I mailed the first one back for free. The product itself is amazing. I have cooked fish on several occasions. The fish came out better tasting than it did when I had fried it. However, unless you have small pieces of meat, you can only cook one time. I have found, that trying to cook two pieces of fish at once does not work well since a lot of the steam holes get covered up. For this reason, I detract one star. In the future, I would like to see a larger version of the same product.
customer_reviews.author: Chris and Christie

customer_reviews.title: Buy it if you don’t mind some part gets rocky dirty. Good price.
customer_reviews.text: Everything is really good except it is not easy to clean. The center part gets rocky dirty as you use it more frequently. The steamer part is easy to clean and I can use it to steam dumplings, buns, sticky rice and eggs and anything. Really cheap but Good. Still recommend it if you don’t want to spend too much money. You can cook two dishes at one time since it has too layers.
customer_reviews.author: ling

customer_reviews.title: Great for steaming different foods simultaneosuly
customer_reviews.text: Love this steamer. It holds a large amount ( full large head of cauliflower in one of the baskets). I love the fact that you can see as the food cooks as my former steamer did not have this advantage. I have steamed different foods at the same time in the two baskets, was concerned food taste would bleed into each other but this does NOT happen. Lightweight, easy to clean and stores nicely as it stacks upon itself. I definitely steam more often due to this great product.
customer_reviews.author: Cindi t

customer_reviews.title: ... cooker finally bit the dust and I was not happy with any of the newer styles I found in ...
customer_reviews.text: My 20-year-old rice cooker finally bit the dust and I was not happy with any of the newer styles I found in stores. Many lacked a timer. This is a really handy alternative for cooking rice, chicken, fish and vegetables. It does take up a bit more space but it also does a lot more. It's nice to be able to cook rice and vegetables at the same time. I'd recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: ZWoman

customer_reviews.title: Food itself super great and an attractive machine but the leak makes ...
customer_reviews.text: I fear there is water leaking from ... somewhere? I have used now about five times to be sure - and the water is definitely leaking though I can't tell the source from where in the unit itself. So odd and disappointing. Food itself super great and an attractive machine but the leak makes it unusable?
customer_reviews.author: Natashamay

customer_reviews.title: Worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: I bought the food steamer because I've been trying to eat healthier and using multiple gadgets to cook meals. This steamer cooks it all at one time and does it quickly. Heated up in less than a minute. Even frozen vegetables were thawed and cooked within 15 minutes while meat was cooking in the lower tray. Trays stack neatly together for easy storage. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: DancerFanTC

customer_reviews.title: Even tho it’s priced so cheap, it works very well. Great bargain. Get one before price goes up.
customer_reviews.text: Thank you Bella for a great rice cooker at a great price. I’m a senior living alone and having trouble maintaining weight and just learning out of necessity to cook. Rice cooker is wonderful. Eating rice and steamed vegggies and meat and gaining weight and everything tastes so good. You can add spices to rice and it comes out so good. Thanks again for my renewed health.
customer_reviews.author: William Parker Satisfied repeat customer

customer_reviews.title: No more meal prep for me!
customer_reviews.text: Working long shifts, my time off was wasted meal prepping or hitting the gym, laundry etc. There's no such thing as "day off" anymore. I will just put veggies and fish in here and set the timer! Takes maybe 15 mins for a full meal and can just toss everything in the waster. It's so great and so easy to eat healthy. I can even use it on frozen veggies. So glad I bought this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Ren

customer_reviews.title: DON'T PURCHASE! It leaks ALL the water you put in...like a sive. Electrical hazard!
customer_reviews.text: this is a terrible product. it leaks A LOT! i didn't realize there are so many complaints about the same problem i am having, or i wouldn't have bought it. its also an electrical hazard because of ALL The water it dumps out...it basically dumps out all the water that you put in it to steam your food. DON'T PURCHASE
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best steamer on the market - it has everything and performs!
customer_reviews.text: We have looked for weeks to find a suitable replacement to a years old Black and Decker steamer that finally died. Most other steamers today are 5 qt or less capacity and so it is tough to fit any larger items like artichokes in them. Also, so many of the other steamers are underpowered such that while it steams, it is a weak steam, so that it takes forever to cook items. This Bella unit is far superior to any we've tried, it looks great, and the exterior fill drawer makes it simple to add water when it's low. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Sandwah

customer_reviews.title: Best steamer I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: I am a fan of electric steamers and have owned several over the course of the last twenty years. This is the best one I have ever bought. It does not do anything fancy. I wish it had an electronic display. I wish the numbers on the dial were easier to read. None of that really matters in the face of the simple fact that this works exactly as it is supposed to. It is faster than any of the other steamers I have used in the past. It's sturdy. I have had it for a while now, and it is still going strong!
customer_reviews.author: KillerBunny

customer_reviews.title: Product is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a healthy choice in eating this steamer will help in making your life easier. I usually use it for potatoes and green bananas or like pumpkin. Im Jamaican so the hard stuff mostly and when I say I am inlove with this I mean it. It is efficient, easy to clean and also easy to use does not take much to understand. I love it its an overall good thing to have I also love the idea that you can make it into two tiers one for vegetables and the other for your protein.
customer_reviews.author: Proshana Harriott

customer_reviews.title: Product broke down after 10 use
customer_reviews.text: Buyers be aware!!!! This is an extremely low quality product. I bought it about two months ago, and was using it like once a week. It stopped working after 10 uses. I'm paying $30 just to use this product for 10 times?????? RIDICULOUS. DO NOT BUY THIS SHTTY PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Nie Xiaoshan

customer_reviews.title: Damaged item when received
customer_reviews.text: The item was damaged. There are several small plastic pieces inside the box. When I lift the box I noticed and heard small sound of broken small pieces.
customer_reviews.author: marilyn orda

customer_reviews.title: So Happy With It!
customer_reviews.text: I received this today and used it right away (after running the removable parts through the dishwasher). I am thrilled with it. The baskets are huge. I was able to steam asparagus and hard-boil 12 eggs at the same time. BOTH were cooked perfectly. THis is going to help me lose some of the TEN pandemic pounds I packed on the past few months. Perfect for preparing Keto-friendly veggies and proteins. And the black base is sleek enough that I dont have to hide it away. I am going to keep it on the counter because I will be using it daily! Thank you for this gem. A+++
customer_reviews.author: April,

customer_reviews.title: The carrots took much longer than what was recommended. The next time Itried to use it
customer_reviews.text: I used my steamer 2 times before it stopped working. I cooked salmon and broccoli the first time. It worked well. Then I cooked baby carrots. The carrots took much longer than what was recommended. The next time Itried to use it, the steamer never heated up. Sure I could probably get a replacement, but I wasn’t that impressed with the steamer. It was cheap, and it was made of cheap plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Lynsey Potts

customer_reviews.title: Love this steamer a lot
customer_reviews.text: I had a really bad steamer before... it was to small, hard to see buttons, hard to fill, etc. I really didn’t think this steamer was going to be worth it... I was wrong. This steamer is amazing and has exceeded all my expectations. Food comes out perfectly cooked, there’s a guide on the actual steamer for a couple of mostly cooked items by consumers, etc. I love this steamer, it’s used daily. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Taylor

customer_reviews.title: I use it every chance I get
customer_reviews.text: I have been making baby food and this is fabulous to make HUGE batches of food. I have steamed a lot of meals for the whole family while making baby food. Even went as far to steam food for the cats and dog... Plan to steam food for pet snails I didn't even buy yet.... Its a really nice steamer
customer_reviews.author: Rivera family

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: it is very easy to use for me. only thing is use it right... my mother-in-law added water in the wrong level several times before, might has burn it a little...but it still usable. only thing is the shape is wired, most my round plates won't fit. however, it is good shape for storage...
customer_reviews.author: Skye

customer_reviews.title: Timer setting numbers are impossible to read
customer_reviews.text: I would consider this a good product but I can not read the timer setting numbers in certain light or angles. Why someone would design it like this is beyond me. I am going to have to mark setting with a sharpie, kind of wish I had return product now.
customer_reviews.author: Gary W. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: It absolutely makes healthy eating way easier than ever expected. Got this for two years and broke it when moving. First thing to purchase after settling down in new place. Easily cook a whole set of healthy meal in 20min. Just buy it if you see this
customer_reviews.author: chenhui g.

customer_reviews.title: Can steam all the food I want now.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this steamer because i want to make homemade bao buns as opposed to buying them which will save me a lot of money because i like to eat. Very easy to use and clean. I can see my food as it is steaming as opposed to having to open one with a top and letting steam out.
customer_reviews.author: Deon L. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: i like this product
customer_reviews.text: overall, the product does it's thing and i like it. The only thing i am not so so amazed is the transparent plastics, they don't feel that durable or there mus be a reason why they are designed like that.
customer_reviews.author: JERBETS

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I only used this steamer X 3 , stopped heating up water for steam
customer_reviews.author: Ewmsv

customer_reviews.title: It's not rounded...
customer_reviews.text: Maybe it was my fault. I didn't realize that it is not rounded until arrived. This means that a lot of the plates can't be placed inside... Other than that it would have been great.
customer_reviews.author: Walden

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: It works! Had a Black & Decker steamer I hated to lose after using it for years. Took a chance on this one and couldn't be happier. Size is perfect for all the fresh vegetables I eat... an entire head of cauliflower fits easily. Much easier to clean than anticipated. Going to try steaming salmon soon. Only drawback is few directions for cooking times but I can improvise. Love this machine!
customer_reviews.author: Anne H.

customer_reviews.title: Great steamer!
customer_reviews.text: I love this steamer. The double tier allows me to cook multiple items together. My favorite so far has been the frozen salmon on the bottom and the veggies in the top. It takes about 25 minutes to cook both and the salmon filets are juicy. I also did a frozen chicken breast that was super juicy. There is a slot for extra water to be added but so far I haven't had to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Things I like about this steamer is the height
customer_reviews.text: Things I like about this steamer is the height. I can get artichokes in it. And it does a great job with broccoli. What I don't like is the difficulty seeing the number on the timer. The numbers on the silver ring around the knob are the same color and very hard to see. Also, hard to see the Msx and Min water level lines inside where the water goes.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara A. Vinocur

customer_reviews.title: Yum 😋 & super easy
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for!! Cooks perfectly and now I can stay on weight watchers and not be hungry anymore!!! It’s an easy way to be healthy and cook.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy

customer_reviews.title: Love this!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one to buy. My last one got broken during a crappy packing job for a cross country move. I love this and how easy it is to clean. Washed in a dishwasher and it cleans it well. Love the basket size for steaming large amounts of veggies at once.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Steamer
customer_reviews.text: Not bad. Not real sturdy like the 20 year old one I’m replacing . Really have no use for second basket, but you can use only 1. Priced right
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This steamer has lots of added features that made it an easy choice.
customer_reviews.text: I was happy to find out that the 2 containers you steam in nest for easy storage. I almost didn t get it because I wanted one that nests and it didn t say that it did. They should add that to their product description.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: An excellent addition to any kitchen. Very well made and easy to use (be sure to read the instructions to avoid slicing off the end of your finger, though!). Worth every penny and more.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Card

customer_reviews.title: Open side drawer if yours leaks
customer_reviews.text: Like other reviewers said, it leaked water from the side at first, but we found that opening the small black drawer on the side solves this problem!
customer_reviews.author: kc

customer_reviews.title: Bella 7.4 quart healthy food stesmer, Dual
customer_reviews.text: I sent to my son. He is a single parent. Fixing meals for three children, can be overwhelming. He fixed his first vegetables with broccoli, carrots, Brussels sprouts and was thrilled. Wants to fix healthy meals for his children. I am so happy for him😁 Proud to
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Simple and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Used for Very simple to use with just one control. Rice dish makes fluffy rice while steaming veggies. Used for making figgy pudding the old fashioned way from 1903 cookbook.
customer_reviews.author: James W Hepler

customer_reviews.title: Love this steamer!!
customer_reviews.text: I have used this a handful of times now and it never lets me down. It holds a decent amount of food and it cooks everything perfectly. I’ve used this multiple times for chicken, fish, veggies (both fresh and frozen) and rice and I have never been disappointed. Make sure to really season your foods or it will get lost.
customer_reviews.author: FzzyKttnPws

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, clean and store
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a cheap yet good quality food steamer for quite a while. After receiving it used it right away. Great size for 2 people. Easy to clean and store. The only problem is timer doesn’t work. I set it up for dumplings for 30 minutes it didn’t do the countdown. Had to set up an alarm on my phone. Besides that quality is really great.
customer_reviews.author: karashash Akylbayeva

customer_reviews.title: Seller is Reliable
customer_reviews.text: Sorry but the manufacturer needs to improve on this item, the plastics did not fit well were too loose and there is no Off button to turn off the steamer if you decided not to continue with the timing. Could be a good product if they improve it. The seller was very co-operative I returned the item the seller is good, just the product not good right now, needs improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Rose Lickiss

customer_reviews.title: Real piece of garbage.
customer_reviews.text: I bought as replacement of similar steamer I used for 6 years other brand not available anymore. . I use it 1 or 2 Times a week. After about 15 usage, the timer is broken. Return window is closed. Real piece of garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Daphné Allanore-de Baritault

customer_reviews.title: Wow!!
customer_reviews.text: We are loving this thing! Asparagus, Cod, chicken filets, everything just taste better! Cleaning isn’t too bad. So worth it!
customer_reviews.author: krystalchick

customer_reviews.title: Bella 7.4 Qt steamer
customer_reviews.text: nice to cook two vegies or poach fish or rice or eggs- I use it almost every day - it is easy to use - easy to clean . I love the two layers so you can steam many items at one time
customer_reviews.author: madcowgirl

customer_reviews.title: wow
customer_reviews.text: i dont know why i did not get one of this before, one of the best kitchen electric item.... it make so easy to cook a lot of kind of food... really easy, and with 2 containers at same time is very versatile...
customer_reviews.author: JudasC

customer_reviews.title: Conveinient but can make a puddle
customer_reviews.text: I love my steamer and I use it all the time. Just be aware which tray you use if you are only using one. If you accidentally use the larger one it will make a puddle on the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Tana

customer_reviews.title: Overall I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. I like the simple timer. So far I have only cooked vegetables in it and only used one of the baskets.Overall I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Ritzema

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work after only 1 month
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this product a handful of times since late December 2017 when I ordered it and when I went to use it, just one month after receiving it, it no longer steams. The timer ticks, but it no longer heats up. Don't buy the product!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Hutch

customer_reviews.title: Easy to steam easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: No more expensive runs to buy steamed sea food. I buy all the seafood I love and steam it in a matter of minutes with the vegetables of my choice . All in the comfort of my home. The clean up is quick and the drip tray collects all the natural fat for an even healthier meal.
customer_reviews.author: ROSIE J. PEREZ

customer_reviews.title: Good steamer.
customer_reviews.text: Good steamer and faster cooker for fish fillet. Now I want to explore more food options.
customer_reviews.author: Hong

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and Easy Cooking for One.
customer_reviews.text: This thing has been a life saver. I live alone and am fairly serious about my diet. This steamer allows me to easily make chicken vegetables and rice without the hassle of traditional cooking and cleanup. My one suggestion is that you get a good brush with soap nozzle built in for cleaning the trays as food can stick in the recesses. Dishwashing will quickly crack the plastic. I have used mine almost every day for the last two years with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb D.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, steam some healthy food.
customer_reviews.text: After receiving this, I immediately steamed some broccoli and some corn on the cob. It was awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Jiaxi

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use: Hard to clean
customer_reviews.text: PROS: Loved the dual baskets and the easy to use guide. CONS: Hard to clean with all the crevices. Foods also stain the basket and it's impossible to get out. The last problem may have been my fault but the coating on the element peeled off after three months. I've used the steamer 1 year.
customer_reviews.author: Jolinda Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good unit that's easy to use and well-priced. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because the dial is very hard to read, just as other reviewers have stated. The unit does make a clicking sound when in use, as others have stated, but it is so soft you need to be right on top of the unit to hear it; not an issue at all.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel C

customer_reviews.title: Not a good choice for rice.
customer_reviews.text: It is NOT a good rice cooker. Some grains cook others remain raw. since I bought this mainly as a rice cooker I find it totally useless. I might as well plant flowers in it.
customer_reviews.author: a cook

customer_reviews.title: Apparently reused item
customer_reviews.text: Appeared to be used when we got it. Had water stains on the plastic, the water pour drawer was missing, and the inside box packaging looked to have been rewrapped. If I hadnt needed it immediately I would have sent it back. I didnt have time to return and replace. Just gave it a heavy wash and used it. Its nice. I just dont care for it being used before.
customer_reviews.author: Temporary Sanity

customer_reviews.title: Great value! Cooks a lot at one time
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm! Replaced an old one with this gem! Easy to use, clean and store. Cooks a lot at one time!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Price

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase....
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use. Love that I can do corn on the cob & 2 different veggies at once. Easy to clean
customer_reviews.author: JCNP

customer_reviews.title: So far so good with this rice/veggie steamer
customer_reviews.text: So far so good with this rice/veggie steamer. Truly, so far the hardboiled eggs have been spot on perfect every time. Rice cooking is okay, just have to adjust the water and time as needed. I agree with some of the other reviews the dial readings could be a little bigger. I would recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy L. Poire

customer_reviews.title: Ingenious Large Capacity Steamer that nests to a reasonable size for storage
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my 30 year old Black and Decker steamer, and I'm 100% pleased with this product. Yes it's great for all types of veggies (my primary use) but it also makes the best hard-boiled eggs I've ever had! I highly recommend this product--you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: M. F. Summy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and clean
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly easy to use and clean. I love this thing, so far we have steamed different veggies for baby food and did chicken breast. Every thing has turned out great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and easy
customer_reviews.text: So convenient to use. The steamer looks not really big(that's nice) but its dual has enough space for 2 people's meal. Very easy, just put some water in the bottom container and set up timer. Steam food has never been so easy. It's BPA free.
customer_reviews.author: Cruise

customer_reviews.title: Garbage. Pure and simple.
customer_reviews.text: Garbage in garbage out. Off gassed chemical smell when opened. The figment of the trays is so bad it doesn’t snap into place at all. Simply magic alone is holding this thing together. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J Time

customer_reviews.title: Great Product ...A Dieters Best Friend
customer_reviews.text: This product is well built , efficiently packaged and easy to open. The steam function begins in seconds. Corn in this thing is excellent and so easy. Any and all vegetables can be thrown in this thing and cooked in minutes. I would highly recommend this product to anyone trying to increase there intake of Vegetables ....I really enjoy this product
customer_reviews.author: Nesbomber

customer_reviews.title: Skeptic to Believer
customer_reviews.text: Just received Saturday!! Used for the first time today (Tuesday) and I love it!!!! I was skeptical of how my fish would turn out but omg!! Soooooo easy to use!! I was able to do my daily (after work) housework and make an entire meal of Pollocks, rice and corn on the cob without standing over the stove!!! I think this will quickly become a daily use!!!
customer_reviews.author: Busy Bee

customer_reviews.title: 8 minutes to perfect lobster tails
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to try to steam the tails to retain flavor. I bought this for a very good price and am surprised with the results. The tail came out perfectly. I did non use any spices or butter during the cooking so as not to have a heavy clean up. Great results for lobster.
customer_reviews.author: Roni

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Basically it is a good steamer, it would be perfect if the container goes with a lid
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Excellent steamer!
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of space as well as a water lever guide. It's perfect for what we want to do.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Cole

customer_reviews.title: Best electric steamer I have ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: Very well made and works perfectly! I have had several electric steamers over the last 20+ years, and this has proved to be my overall favorite. Super fast, super healthy, super delicious cooking. Easy to clean, easy to see water level, easy to add more water, PERFECT (no guessing!) hard boiled eggs every time: rice, fish, veggies, etc!
customer_reviews.author: CJ Smith

customer_reviews.title: Loving my steamer. I use it every day. ...
customer_reviews.text: Loving my steamer. I use it every day. I steam Chinese buns for my kids' breakfast and the top tray, I steam their lunches I packed the night before so they have warm lunches. I steam eggs, veggies. I have been using it for months now and still loving it!
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Made life an little easier
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use easy to clean. I use it for rice vegies and other stuff like potstickers. Tasty food and easy to store and use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Is there a better one?
customer_reviews.text: This leaks.... Water everywhere, aroundca cup of water on the surface you use this on. The bowls don't fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Setzie

customer_reviews.title: Came quick
customer_reviews.text: We have used this type for years to cook vegetables or fish.
customer_reviews.author: mark whitson

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to add more water in the fill opening
customer_reviews.text: The Bella 7.4 Quart Healthy Food Steamer, Dual Basket arrived on time and well packaged. The steamer is everything I expected it to do and then some. It is easy to add more water in the fill opening.
customer_reviews.author: Donald

customer_reviews.title: The Bella Steamer is a GREAT STEAMER.
customer_reviews.text: I love my food steamer, it's wonderful steaming brings out all the natural flavor in your food. I use it all the time to steam fresh vegetables they're so tasty. I also loaded it out to my Niece and she loved it as well, I may have to get her one to now.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Steams like a dream
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing. I use it every day, it cooks chicken and fish really well, and steas vegetables great, you have to let it soak a little while before washing it, but it does come clean
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a 30 year old Black and Decker and loved it at first. I use it once a week and now less than three months later it is not steaming. My eggs are raw. And of course I'm two weeks out of the available to return date. Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndee Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Worst steamer ever
customer_reviews.text: This product is a piece of crap. I used it once and it was fine, but when I came back the second time....absolutely nothing. Do not waste your money
customer_reviews.author: Dclemons2011

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I just used my steamer for the first time last night. It’s the first time I’ve owned a double decker. Shrimp on the bottom, fresh green beans on top. Eighteen minutes later dinner was ready. Everything was so fresh and flavorful. Love this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Loauise She

customer_reviews.title: eat steamer I have owned so far
customer_reviews.text: This steamer works great and is easy to clean. Great for steamed buns, lot stickers and even heated up soft taco tortillas in it on the top tear. Worked like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Dubinko

customer_reviews.title: Poor Product
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a Christmas gift 2019 and was just used two days ago. It leaks water. Tried it again and still leaks wawter all over the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Kathie K. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: It gets very hot. So be careful in removing trays.
customer_reviews.text: It steams very fast. Had a steamer years ago, but this one is awesome. I'm going to order one for my mom. So glad I purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality worth the low price
customer_reviews.text: I had it for 6 months and clear plastic bowl started to crack so I finally had to throw away whole steamer. $35 divided by 6 months is about $6 a month so I would say that it is OK to pay this for a poor quality steamer to be thrown away after 6 months. Will I ever buy Bella Steamer again? No. I will look for something else.
customer_reviews.author: exefor

customer_reviews.title: One of the better Steamers
customer_reviews.text: Couldn't replace my original Oster Streamer but this one seems to do the trip
customer_reviews.author: Chas

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Steaming after 9 Months
customer_reviews.text: This steamer worked great... until it didn't. It worked well for 9 months and then stopped. We used it 1-2 times a week. Now it no longer puts out enough steam to cook the food. No visible changes, and obviously I know how to use it, since it used to work fine. I can NOT recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Diggs

customer_reviews.title: Watch out for steam burns
customer_reviews.text: Used for steaming vegetables. Really dangerous for steam burns. Used many dedicated steamers with no issues this badly designed.
customer_reviews.author: Fred

customer_reviews.title: These are not easily found in stores.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I have bought this steamer and, needless to say that I like it. I've had the first one for several years and it still works. I just thought it was time for a new one. It is only made of plastic but it sure get the job done and is very durable. Can't go wrong for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

product_meta.title: BELLA (13872) 7.4 Quart Healthy Food Steamer with 2-Tier Stackable Baskets
product_meta.description: Size:4.78 lb.The BELLA 7 Liter (7.4 Quart) Food Steamer is the perfect and healthy way to cook your favorite foods. This health-focused cooking method shaves off the unwanted calories and unnecessary cooking additives/oils helping you live a healthier and cleaner dietary lifestyle! The BELLA Food Steamer cooks your favorite meats, veggies and grains with one quick twist of knob. Simply pour in the water, set your food in the cooking basket and set the timer. Voila! You will be enjoying your juicy and flavor packed meal in under 1 hour! What's more? This unit features an auto shutoff feature and boil dry protection for ultimate safety. By steam-cooking, the vegetables are kept as close to their natural raw state as possible, whileheating through thoroughly. This not only prevents the vegetables from turning mushy but it also allows them to retain their original color, taste, juices and freshness
feature_bullets: FOOD STEAMER: With 7.4 quarts of cooking capacity & 2 separate steaming containers, you can cook a full meal with sides with one simple turn of a switch. Features auto shutoff & boil dry protection for simple & safe cooking

ALL YOU NEED: A 2-tier design allows you to cook multiple items at once for quick & easy meal preparation—simply set the timer & watch it work! Includes 2 steaming containers, grain tray & lid which are all dishwasher safe

GUESS-FREE COOKING: The water reservoir view window ensures you'll always know whether you have enough water to finish the job at hand, and a guess-free steaming guide chart is embedded on the unit so you can guarantee perfect steaming results every time.

KITCHEN ESSENTIALS: BELLA offers a full range of high-quality products including air fryers, waffle irons, toasters, coffee makers, electric kettles, slow cookers, espresso machines, griddles & juicers.

MIX IT UP: The kitchen should be fun. With BELLA It can be. We provide you with quick & convenient kitchen solutions to simplify your hectic life, including small kitchen appliances, cookware & housewares.
Vegetables are kept as close to their natural raw state as possible, while heating through thoroughly while retaining their original color, taste, juices and freshness
Features auto-shutoff with boil dry protection so you are ensured foods are being cooked safely
No oil, no smoke, no mess - cleaning up is easy. Steam baskets and rice cup and dishwasher safe for easy clean up

Quick start heating system that allows you to be steaming in as little as 30 seconds! Steam your favorite foods from fish, red meat, poultry, shellfish, tofu, vegetables, and grains. Even get creative with other foods such as dumplings and dim sum! Possibilities are endless
2 basket cooking system allows you to separate vegetables and meats so you can prepare different dishes simultaneously for special dietary needs
